Source: Tūkstantinės minios panika Centriniame parke griuvus barjerui
Reference: Thousands in Central Park panic after barrier collapse
Translation: Thousands in a panic in Central Park after a barrier collapses

Source: Tūkstančiai žmonių, supanikavusių dėl galimų šūvių politinio pobūdžio renginyje, pasileido bėgti Centriniu parku sugriuvus policijos barjerui.
Reference: The collapse of a police barrier sent thousands of people fleeing in a panic in Central Park, afraid of possible gunshots at a politically-charged show.
Translation: Thousands of people, panicked by the possibility of shots at a politically charged event, took off running through Central Park after a police barrier collapsed.

Source: Žinomos asmenybės – Demokratų partijai atstovaujantis Niujorko gubernatorius Andrew Cuomo’as, Respublikonų senatorius Jeffas Flake’as, Janeta Jackson, Johnas Legendas – paragino žiūrovus įsitraukti į audringą šalies politiką.
Reference: Big-name personalities from Democratic New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo and Republican Sen. Jeff Flake to Janet Jackson and John Legend urged spectators to get involved in the nation's troubled politics.
Translation: Notable figures – Democratic Party representative New York Governor Andrew Cuomo, Republican Senator Jeff Flake, Janet Jackson, John Legend – encouraged viewers to get involved in the country's turbulent politics.

Source: Nugriuvus barjerui šeštadienio vakarą vykusiame renginyje, valdžios institucijos greitai patikino žiūrovus, kad jie yra saugūs.
Reference: Authorities quickly assured the crowd they were safe after the barrier fell Saturday evening.
Translation: After the barrier collapsed during the Saturday evening event, government institutions quickly reassured the spectators that they were safe.

Source: Saulėtą popietę prasidėjusiame renginyje daugiausia kalbėta apie socialinį teisingumą.
Reference: Burning social justice issues dominated the event that started on a sunny afternoon.
Translation: On a sunny afternoon, at the beginning of the event, most of the talk was about social justice.

Source: Maždaug 60 000 stebėtojų susirinko į Didžiojoje pievoje vykusį Visuotinį piliečių festivalį, kuriame turėjo pasirodyti Cardi B, The Weeknd ir kitos popžvaigždės.
Reference: About 60,000 people filled the park's Great Lawn for the Global Citizen Festival, also awaiting Cardi B, The Weeknd and other pop stars.
Translation: Approximately 60,000 spectators gathered at the Great Lawn for the Global Citizen Festival, which was set to feature Cardi B, The Weeknd, and other pop stars.

Source: Kai kurie kalbėjusieji paprašė žiūrovų paskambinti jiems atstovaujantiems Kongreso nariams ir pareikšti nuomonę apie šią savaitę vykusius Senato posėdžius dėl kandidato į Aukščiausiąjį teismą Bretto Kavanaugh‘o.
Reference: Some speakers asked the audience to call their Congress members to react to this week's Senate hearings for Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh.
Translation: Some speakers asked the audience to call the members of Congress who represent them and express their opinion about the Senate hearings that took place this week regarding Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh.

Source: Nepertraukiama Alastairo Seeley’o pergalių serija „British Supersport“ lenktynėse Asene
Reference: Alastair Seeley continues British Supersport winning run at Assen
Translation: The unbroken series of Alastair Seeley's victories in the "British Supersport" races at Assen

Source: Alastairas Seeley’is išlaikė laimėtojo poziciją „British Supersports“ lenktynėse
Reference: Alastair Seeley has continued his winning form in British Supersports
Translation: Alastair Seeley maintained his winning position in the "British Supersports" races

Source: Alastairas Seeley’is iškovojo trečią pergalę per penkias „British Supersport“ lenktynes, nugalėjęs šeštadienį Nyderlandų mieste Asene vykusiame 12 ratų sprinte.
Reference: Alastair Seeley took his third win in five British Supersport races by taking victory in Saturday's 12-lap sprint race at Assen in the Netherlands.
Translation: Alastair Seeley secured his third win in five British Supersport races, triumphing in Saturday's 12-lap sprint at Assen in the Netherlands.

Source: Lenktynininkas iš Karikferguso 0,05 sek. aplenkė „Yamaha“ vairuojantį Jacką Kennedy.
Reference: The Carrickfergus rider took the chequered flag by 0.05 seconds from fellow Yamaha rider Jack Kennedy.
Translation: The rider from Carrickfergus beat Yamaha-riding Jack Kennedy by 0.05 seconds.

Source: 38 m. nugalėtojas šį mėnesį taip pat triumfavo Silverstone ir Oulton parke.
Reference: The 38-year-old also won races at Silverstone and Oulton Park this month.
Translation: The 38-year-old winner also triumphed at Silverstone and Oulton Park this month.

Source: Seeley’is atstovauja Šiaurės Airijos komandai „EHA Racing“, su kuria gegužės mėn. jis jau laimėjo tarptautines „North West 200“ lenktynes.
Reference: Seeley is competing for the Northern Ireland-based EHA Racing outfit for whom he won a race at the North West 200 international road races in May.
Translation: Seeley represents the Northern Ireland team "EHA Racing", with whom he has already won the international "North West 200" races in May.

Source: Buvęs Britanijos čempionas visas lenktynes rungėsi su Kennedy ir, nepaisant visų dubliniečio pastangų, jam nepavyko pralenkti varžovo iš Šiaurės Airijos.
Reference: The former British champion and Kennedy were involved in a race-long scrap and despite the Dubliner's last-ditch attempts he was unable to squeeze past the Northern Irishman.
Translation: The former British champion contested the entire race with Kennedy and, despite all the Dubliner's efforts, he failed to overtake his opponent from Northern Ireland.

Source: Seeley’io komandos draugas Davidas Allinghamas šeštadienio „Supersport“ lenktynėse liko septintas.
Reference: Seeley's team-mate David Allingham was seventh in Saturday's Supersport race.
Translation: A member of Seeley's team, David Allingham, finished seventh in Saturday's "Supersport" race.

Source: Scottas Swannas „British Talent Cup“ lenktynes baigė aštuntas.
Reference: Scott Swann was eighth in the British Talent Cup race.
Translation: Scott Swann finished eighth in the "British Talent Cup" races.

Source: „Be Wiser Ducati“ vairuojantis Glennas Irwinas, bandantis pakilti aukščiau dabartinės ketvirtos vietos čempionato reitinguose, dviejuose sekmadienio „British Superbike“ lenktynių kvalifikaciniuose važiavimuose buvo ketvirtas.
Reference: Glenn Irwin was fourth quickest in qualifying for Sunday's two British Superbike races on his Be Wiser Ducati as he aims to improve on his current fourth place in the championship standings.
Translation: "Be Wiser Ducati" rider Glenn Irwin, trying to move up from his current fourth place in the championship standings, was fourth in both of Sunday's "British Superbike" qualifying sessions.

Source: Šią savaitę pranešta, kad Irwinas 2019 m. sezoną pereis į komandą „JG Speedfit Kawasaki“.
Reference: It was revealed earlier this week that Irwin would switch to the JG Speedfit Kawasaki team for the 2019 season.
Translation: This week it was announced that Irwin will move to the "JG Speedfit Kawasaki" team for the 2019 season.

Source: Michaelas Laverty iš Toome, vairuojantis „Tyco BMW“, užėmė 13 vietą, o Andrew Irwinas ir jo „PBM Ducati“ – 14 vietą.
Reference: Toomebridge pilot Michael Laverty was 13th on his Tyco BMW and Andrew Irwin 14th on the second of the PBM Ducatis.
Translation: Michael Laverty from Toome, riding for "Tyco BMW", took 13th place, while Andrew Irwin and his "PBM Ducati" took 14th place.

Source: Kodėl Honkongo namų darbininkai mokosi šokio judesių?
Reference: Why are Hong Kong domestic workers practising their dance moves?
Translation: Why are Hong Kong's domestic workers learning dance moves?

Source: Honkonge namų darbininkais dirba apie 300 000 užsieniečių.
Reference: Some 300,000 foreign domestic helpers work in Hong Kong.
Translation: In Hong Kong, around 300,000 foreigners work as domestic workers.

Source: Jų pagal įstatymus reikalaujama gyventi darbdavių namuose.
Reference: They're required by law to live in their employers' home.
Translation: They are required by law to live in their employers' homes.

Source: Šie darbuotojai už nedidelį atlygį dirba šešias dienas per savaitę, iki 18 valandų per dieną.
Reference: They work six days a week, up to 18 hours a day - for a very small salary.
Translation: These workers work six days a week, up to 18 hours a day, for a small salary.

Source: Šis pasakojimas – apie Mhelanie, kuri vienintelį laisvadienį skiria bendruomenės renginiams, padedantiems atsiplėšti nuo izoliuojančios darbo rutinos.
Reference: This is the story of Mhelanie who uses her only day off to take part in community events to escape her isolating work routine.
Translation: This story is about Mhelanie, who spends her only day off attending community events that help her break away from the isolating work routine.

Source: Spurgų pardavėją Liną Ognissanti pagerbs Bedfordo meras
Reference: Doughnut seller Lina Ognissanti to be honoured by Bedford mayor
Translation:
The translation of the Lithuanian text to English is:

"Chip shop owner Lina Ognissanti to be honored by the Mayor of Bedford"

Source: Nuotraukoje: Lina Ognissanti šiltuoju metų laiku prekiauja ledais, o žiemą – spurgomis.
Reference: Image caption Lina Ognissanti sells ice creams in warmer months and doughnuts during the winter
Translation: In the photo: Lina Ognissanti sells ice in the warm season and spurgos in the winter.

Source: Daugiau nei 40 metų spurgomis ir ledais miesto centre prekiavusi moteris bus pagerbta – jai surengtas privatus mero priėmimas.
Reference: A woman who has sold doughnuts and ice creams in a town centre for more than 40 years is to be honoured with a private mayoral reception.
Translation: A woman who has been selling flowers and ice cream in the city center for over 40 years will be honored - a private mayor's reception has been organized for her.

Source: Lina Ognissanti, prekiaujanti ledais ir spurgomis kioskelyje „Dinky Donuts“ Bedfordo Midland Road gatvėje, kartu su šeima buvo pakviesta popiečio arbatėlės.
Reference: Lina Ognissanti, who runs Dinky Donuts and an ice cream stall on Midland Road, Bedford, has been invited to afternoon tea, along with her family.
Translation: Lina Ognissanti, who sells ice cream and doughnuts at the "Dinky Donuts" kiosk on Midland Road in Bedford, was invited to afternoon tea with her family by the Pope.

Source: Beveik 3 000 žmonių internetu pasirašė peticiją siekdami, kad ji būtų apdovanota ar sulauktų pripažinimo.
Reference: Almost 3,000 people signed an online petition to get her an award or recognition.
Translation: Almost 3,000 people signed a petition online seeking for her to be awarded or recognized.

Source: P. Ognissanti teigė, kad jai garbė sulaukti tokių pagyrų.
Reference: Mrs Ognissanti said it was an "honour" to be thought of so highly.
Translation: P. Ognissanti said that it was an honor for her to receive such praise.

Source: Pasak Bedfordo mero Dave’o Hodgsono, p. Ognissanti su vaikais ir anūkais buvo pakviesta į jo kabinetą apžiūrėti miesto regalijų ir istorinių artefaktų bei išgerti popiečio arbatos.
Reference: The Mayor of Bedford, Dave Hodgson, said Mrs Ognissanti, along with her children and grandchildren, had been invited to his parlour to view the civic regalia and historical artefacts and to have afternoon tea.
Translation: According to Bedford's mayor Dave Hodgson, Mrs. Ognissanti was invited with her children and grandchildren to his office to view the town's regalia and historical artifacts and to have afternoon tea.

Source: „Lina Bedforfe užima ypatingą vietą, o jos kioskas yra miesto centro dalis“, – teigė jis.
Reference: "Lina has a special status in Bedford, and her stand is an institution in the town centre," he said.
Translation: "Lina Bedford holds a special place, and her kiosk is a part of the city center," he said.

Source: Džiaugiuosi, kad ji priėmė mano kvietimą, ir labai laukiu mūsų susitikimo mano kabinete, kad galėčiau padėkoti Linai už darbą mūsų mieste.“
Reference: "I'm delighted that Lina has accepted my invitation and I look forward to welcoming her to the parlour in order that we can show our appreciation for her contribution to the town."
Translation: "I am delighted that she accepted my invitation, and I very much look forward to our meeting in my office, where I will be able to thank Lina for her work in our city."

Source: P. Ognissanti padėkojo, jos žodžiais, „maloniems“ Bedfordo gyventojams, kurie apie ją pagalvojo, ir sakė: „Tai didelė garbė ir gražus poelgis.“
Reference: Mrs Ognissanti thanked the "lovely" people of Bedford for thinking of her, and said: "It is a great honour, and really nice."
Translation: P. Ognissanti thanked, in her words, the "kind" people of Bedford who thought of her, and said: "It is a great honor and a beautiful gesture."

Source: Peticiją pateikęs Sarkabas Mahmoodas teigė, kad nesitikėjo sulaukti tiek parašų.
Reference: Sarkab Mahmood, who started the petition, said he had not expected such a huge response.
Translation: The petition was submitted by Sarkabas Mahmoodas, who claimed that he did not expect to receive so many signatures.

Source: Išgirdęs apie priėmimą, kurį planuojama surengti iki metų pabaigos, jis teigė: „Labai džiaugiuosi dėl Linos, nes ji to nusipelnė dėl savo puikaus charakterio.“
Reference: On hearing about the reception, which is set to take place by the end of the year, he said: "I am really happy for her, it is all down to Lina being such a great person."
Translation: Having heard about the reception planned to be held by the end of the year, he said: "I am very happy for Lina, because she deserved it due to her excellent character."

Source: Kelyje su Alsterio „Lambretta“ klubu
Reference: Rolling with the Ulster Lambretta Club
Translation: "On the road with Alster's 'Lambretta' club"

Source: Motoroleriai „Lambretta“ buvo nepamainomi 7-ojo dešimtmečio modų kultūros palydovai.
Reference: Lambrettas were an essential accessory in the mod scene of the 1960s.
Translation: Lambretta scooters were inseparable companions of 1960s mod culture.

Source: Grupė itališkojo motorolerio gerbėjų bando išsaugoti tų laikų dvasią.
Reference: The spirit of that era is being kept alive by a group of enthusiasts of the Italian motor scooter.
Translation: A group of Italian motoroller enthusiasts is trying to preserve the spirit of those times.

Source: Praėjus 70 metų po pirmojo Alsterio „Lambretta“ klubo įkūrimo, šį savaitgalį Fermanos apygardoje susirinko maždaug 100 motorolerių mėgėjų iš Jungtinės Karalystės ir Airijos.
Reference: Around 100 scooters from all over the UK and Ireland travelled to Co Fermanagh this weekend, 70 years after the first Ulster Lambretta Club was formed.
Translation: Seventy years after the establishment of the first Alsterio "Lambretta" club, around 100 scooter enthusiasts from the United Kingdom and Ireland gathered in Fermanagh this weekend.

Source: Vienas iš dviejų pirmojo klubo narių Chrisas Wilsonas 1966-aisias įsigijo pirmąją „Lambretta“ už maždaug 40 £.
Reference: Chris Wilson, one of two members of the original club, bought his first Lambretta for around £40 in 1966.
Translation: One of the first two club members, Chris Wilson, acquired his first "Lambretta" in 1966 for about £40.

Source: „Man motoroleris buvo tik transporto priemonė, bet sužinojau, kad galiu panaudoti jį ir kitaip.
Reference: "A scooter was just to me a form of transport, but then there was the option to use it for other things.
Translation: "For me, a motorcycle was just a means of transportation, but I found out that I can use it in other ways too."

Source: Tai buvo šioks toks sportas.
Reference: It was a bit of sport.
Translation: That was some kind of sport.

Source: Neįsitraukiau į modų kultūrą, o dabar turbūt esu tam per senas“, – sakė jis.
Reference: I never did get into the mod scene and I'm probably far too old now for it," he said.
Translation: "I didn't get into the fashion culture, and now I'm probably too old for that," he said.

Source: „Jis buvo gana pigus ir gana patikimas, jį galėjai įsigyti už prieinamą kainą, o įsigijęs nuveikti ką nors daugiau, nei tik nuvažiuoti iš taško A į tašką B.“
Reference: "Basically it was relatively cheap, relatively reliable and they were available for the right amount of money and once you had one there were other things you could do with it other than just riding from A to B."
Translation: "He was quite affordable and quite reliable, you could buy it at an affordable price, and after buying it, you could do something more than just drive from point A to point B."

Source: Jis dalyvaudavo „Lambretta“ atskiro starto lenktynėse Meno salos TT žiede.
Reference: He used to race Lambrettas in time trials around the TT circuit on the Isle of Man.
Translation: He competed in the "Lambretta" solo start races at the Isle of Man TT circuit.

Source: Pirmasis Alsterio „Lambretta“ klubas įkurtas 8-ojo dešimtmečio pradžioje ir pertvarkytas prieš 12 metų.
Reference: The first Ulster Lambretta Club wound up in the early 1970s but it was reformed 12 years ago.
Translation: The first Alsterio "Lambretta" club was established in the early 80s and reorganized 12 years ago.

Source: „Apie 1971 m. motoroleriai ir kitos transporto formos vis mažiau domino žmones, be to, klubai apskritai nukentėjo dėl neramumų, todėl pagalvojau: „Viskas, tai galas“, – sakė Chrisas.
Reference: "It started to die out around 1971, the interest in scooters, other forms of transport and the Troubles didn't help with clubs in general, so I thought, 'No that's it, finished'," Chris said.
Translation: "About 1971, motoroller enthusiasts and other forms of transport were becoming less interesting to people, and besides, the clubs were generally suffering due to the unrest, so I thought: 'That's it, it's all over,' " said Chris.

Source: „Tada kažkuriuo laiku vėl atsirado susidomėjimas ir, panašu, jis vis labiau augo.“
Reference: "And then sometime back there were showings of the interest in it and it seems to have grown and grown."
Translation: "Then at some point, interest reappeared and, it seems, it just kept growing."

Source: Philipas Steele’as yra Alsterio „Lambretta“ klubo, šiuo metu turinčio 97 narius, sekretorius, atsakingas už narystes.
Reference: Philip Steele is the membership secretary of the Ulster Lambretta Club which currently has 97 members.
Translation: Philip Steele is the secretary of the Lambretta Club of Ulster, currently with 97 members, responsible for membership.

Source: „Visų motyvai skirtingi.
Reference: "Everyone's got their own take.
Translation: "All motives are different."

Source: Kai kuriems nariams įtaką padarė modų kultūra, nes nuo jos beveik viskas ir prasidėjo.
Reference: Obviously there'll be guys influenced from the whole mod scene, that's where a lot of it started.
Translation: For some members, fashion culture had an influence, because almost everything started from it.

Source: Kiti yra lenktynių entuziastai ar rokeriai – čia rasite visokių žmonių.
Reference: Other guys are into the racing scene, rockers, there's a mixture of everyone in it here.
Translation: Others are racing enthusiasts or rockers – you'll find all sorts of people here.

Source: Yra ir tokių, kuriems tiesiog įdomus vintažas.
Reference: Some people are just into the vintage thing.
Translation: There are also those who are simply interested in vintage.

Source: Daugelis motorolerių modifikuoti, todėl dviejų vienodų nėra.
Reference: Many of the scooters have been customised and no two are the same.
Translation: Many mopeds are modified, so there are no two that are alike.

Source: Galima nekeisti motorolerio ir ramiai važiuoti 35 ar 40 mylių per valandą greičiu, pritaikytu siauroms Italijos gatvelėms, tačiau kai kurie nariai tai patobulino.
Reference: You can either keep them original and potter along at 35 or 40 mph they were originally designed to go around the small streets in Italy, but some of the guys have tuned these things.
Translation: You can leave the motor scooter as is and ride quietly at a speed of 35 or 40 miles per hour, suitable for Italy's narrow streets, but some members have improved it.

Source: Kai kurie gerokai modifikuoti motoroleriai turbūt galėtų pasiekti iki 100 mylių per valandą greitį.“
Reference: Some of these bikes here probably could do upwards of 100 mph, the super tuned ones. "
Translation: Some heavily modified mopeds could possibly reach speeds of up to 100 miles per hour.

Source: Per savaitgalį pasitaikė gedimų, kai kuriuos motorolerius teko užvesti stumiant.
Reference: There were a few breakdowns and push starts over the weekend.
Translation: Over the weekend, there were breakdowns, and some motorcyclists had to be pushed.

Source: Ir nors Šiaurės Airijos orai ne visada tokie malonūs kaip „Lambretta“ tėvynės Italijos, šįkart Fermanos apygardoje važinėjantiems motoroleriams švietė saulė.
Reference: And while the weather in Northern Ireland isn't always as pleasant as the Lambretta's Italian home, the sun was shining as the scooters toured around County Fermanagh.
Translation: And although the weather in Northern Ireland is not always as pleasant as in "Lambretta's" homeland of Italy, this time in County Fermanagh the motorcyclists were treated to sunshine.

Source: Ruth Davidson prašo torių tylos „Brexito“ klausimu
Reference: Ruth Davidson calls for Tory Brexit 'silence'
Translation: Ruth Davidson asks Tories for silence on "Brexit" issue

Source: Ruth Davidson paprašė savo kolegų konservatorių „tylos periodo“, kad ministrė pirmininkė galėtų susitarti dėl „Brexito“.
Reference: Ruth Davidson has called for a "period of silence" among her Conservative colleagues to allow the prime minister to get a Brexit deal "over the line."
Translation: Ruth Davidson asked her fellow Conservatives for a "period of silence" to allow the Prime Minister to negotiate on "Brexit".

Source: Škotijos torių galva teigė, kad per dvejus metus nuo ES referendumo užteko laiko debatams.
Reference: The Scottish Tory leader said the two years following the EU referendum had provided enough time for debate.
Translation: The head of the Scottish Tories said that two years from the EU referendum was enough time for debates.

Source: Ji pareiškė savo nuomonę po Boriso Johnsono žodžių apie premjerės planą, kurį jis pavadino „beprotišku ir visiškai absurdišku“.
Reference: Her comments follow Boris Johnson's description of the Chequers plan as "deranged and entirely preposterous."
Translation: She expressed her opinion after Boris Johnson's words about the prime minister's plan, which he called "utterly stupid and completely absurd".

Source: Ji BBC laidai „Sunday Politics Scotland“ teigė, kad laikas paremti ministrę pirmininkę.
Reference: She told the BBC's Sunday Politics Scotland it was now time to get behind the prime minister.
Translation: She told BBC's "Sunday Politics Scotland" that it was time to back the First Minister.

Source: Torių aktyvistus subūrusioje partijos konferencijoje Birmingame ji sakė: „Per pastaruosius dvejus metus turėjome laiko debatams.
Reference: As Tory activists assembled in Birmingham for their party conference, she said: "There's been time over the last two years for debate.
Translation: At a party conference in Birmingham, where Tory activists had gathered, she said: "Over the past two years we have had time for debates."

Source: Buvęs užsienio reikalų sekretorius ėjo pareigas viename geriausių kabinetų šalies istorijoje ir tuo laikotarpiu parengta didžioji dalis dabartinio plano, kuris jau buvo pripažintas praėjusių metų lapkritį.
Reference: The former foreign secretary was in one of the great offices of state during the time that much of this plan was being constructed - and praised it as soon ago as November of last year.
Translation: The former foreign minister served in one of the best cabinets in the country's history and during that period, a large part of the current plan was prepared, which was already recognized last November.

Source: Dabar konservatoriai turi paremti ministrę pirmininkę, leisti jai užbaigti sandorį ir padėti įgyvendinti planus šalyje.
Reference: Now is the time for Conservatives to get behind the prime minister, give her the space to get the deal done and to back her to deliver for the country.
Translation: Now the conservatives must support the prime minister, allow her to conclude the deal and help implement the plans in the country.

Source: Manau, kad tylos periodas būtų labai naudingas.“
Reference: In terms of a period of silence, I would be very welcoming of one."
Translation: "I think that a period of silence would be very beneficial."

Source: Jos komentarai sekė aštrią kritiką „Brexito“ debatuose, kurią ne pirmą kartą pareiškė buvęs užsienio reikalų sekretorius Borisas Johnsonas.
Reference: Her comments followed another strident intervention in the Brexit debate by the former foreign secretary, Boris Johnson.
Translation: Her comments followed sharp criticism in the Brexit debates, which was not the first time expressed by former Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson.

Source: Duodama interviu BBC žurnalisto Andrew Marro programoje, Theresa May vėliau patikino, kad tiki „Brexitu“ ir kad jos kabineto planas gali užtikrinti palankų laisvos prekybos sandorį su Europos Sąjunga.
Reference: Theresa May later insisted she did believe in Brexit, telling the BBC's Andrew Marr programme that the Chequers plan had the ability to deliver a good free trade deal with the European Union.
Translation: In an interview given to BBC journalist Andrew Marr's program, Theresa May later confirmed that she believed in "Brexit" and that her cabinet's plan could secure a favorable free trade deal with the European Union.

Source: P. Davidson taip pat teigė, kad dalyvaudama kituose rinkimuose pasižadėtų užkirsti kelią antrajam Škotijos referendumui dėl nepriklausomybės, nes 2014 m. „škotams pažadėta, kad toks įvykis bus vienintelis jų kartoje“.
Reference: Ms Davidson also said she would go into the next election with a manifesto commitment to block a second Scottish independence referendum because in 2014 "the people of Scotland were promised this would be a once in a generation event."
Translation: P. Davidson also claimed that if participating in other elections, she would promise to block a second Scottish independence referendum, as in 2014 "Scots were promised that such an event would be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity".

Source: Paklausta apie galimą pakartotinį referendumą dėl „Brexito“, ji atsakė: „Jei kalbame apie Škotijos istoriją, ne kartą pareiškiau, kad negalima kartoti referendumo, jei esi nacionalistas ir rezultatas tavęs netenkina.
Reference: Asked about calls for another referendum on any Brexit deal, she said: "In terms of our history in Scotland, I've been pretty vocal about the fact that you can't re-run referendums if you are a nationalist because you didn't get the result you want.
Translation: When asked about the possibility of a repeat referendum on "Brexit", she replied: "If we're talking about Scottish history, I've said more than once that you can't repeat a referendum if you're a nationalist and the result doesn't suit you."

Source: Veidmainiaučiau, jei teigčiau, kad galima surengti dar vieną referendumą dėl „Brexito“, nes tikėjausi kitokio rezultato.“
Reference: I'd be pretty hypocritical if I said you could re-run this Brexit referendum because it wasn't the result the I argued for."
Translation: "I would be hypocritical if I said that it's possible to hold another referendum on 'Brexit', because I would expect a different result."

Source: Kelias M8 po policijos incidento vėl atidarytas
Reference: M8 fully reopens after police incident
Translation: The M8 road has been reopened after a police incident.

Source: Greitkelis M8 vėl atidarytas po policijos incidento ties Glazgu.
Reference: The M8 motorway in Glasgow has been fully reopened after being shut by a police incident.
Translation: The M8 motorway has been reopened after a police incident near Glasgow.

Source: Policijos teigimu, kelias šiek tiek anksčiau nei 07.00 val. uždarytas abiem kryptimis 15 Townhead sankryžoje kilus nerimui dėl pėsčiojo.
Reference: Police said the route was closed in both directions at junction 15 Townhead shortly before 07:00 amid concern for the wellbeing of a pedestrian.
Translation: According to the police, the road was closed in both directions shortly before 07.00 at the 15 Townhead junction due to concerns about a pedestrian.

Source: Eismas uždarytame kelyje nevyko tris valandas ir buvo sutrikdytas mieste, kuriame vyksta maratonas „Great Scottish Run“.
Reference: The closure resulted in the route being at a standstill for three hours and traffic disruption in the city, which is hosting the Great Scottish Run.
Translation: Traffic was halted on the closed road for three hours and was disrupted in the city where the "Great Scottish Run" marathon was taking place.

Source: 20 m. vyras vėliau nugabentas į Glazgo karališkąją ligoninę tyrimams.
Reference: A 20-year-old man was later taken to Glasgow Royal Infirmary for checks.
Translation: The 20-year-old man was later taken to Glasgow Royal Infirmary for treatment.

Source: Christine’a Blasey Ford draugė patvirtino pareiškimą dėl seksualinės prievartos, kuria įtariamas Brettas Kavanaugh‘as
Reference: Christine Blasey Ford's friend clarifies statement about alleged assault by Brett Kavanaugh
Translation: A friend of Christine Blasey Ford has confirmed the statement about the sexual assault allegedly committed by Brett Kavanaugh.

Source: Lelanda Keyser, kuri vidurinėje mokykloje draugavo su Dr. Christine’a Blasey Ford, apkaltinusia kandidatą į Aukščiausiąjį teismą Brettą Kavanaugh‘ą seksualine prievarta, kai jie abu buvo paaugliai, parašė laišką Senato teismų komitetui ir paaiškino, kad nors pati ir neprisimena vakarėlio namuose, per kurį galimai įvyko užpuolimas, bet tiki Ford pasakojimu.
Reference: Leland Keyser, a high school friend of Dr. Christine Blasey Ford, who has accused Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh of sexually assaulting her while they were both teenagers, has written a letter to the Senate Judiciary Committee to clarify that although she does not remember the house party where the misconduct allegedly occurred, she believes Ford's account.
Translation:
Here's the translation of the Lithuanian text to English:

Leland Keyser, who was friends with Dr. Christine Blasey Ford in middle school, who accused Supreme Court nominee Brett Kavanaugh of sexual assault when they were both teenagers, wrote a letter to the Senate Judiciary Committee and explained that although she herself does not remember the party at which the alleged assault may have occurred, she believes Ford's account.

Source: Anksčiau Keyser per savo advokatą paskelbė pareiškimą, kad neprisimena minėto vakarėlio ir net nežino, ar buvo sutikusi Kavanaugh‘ą.
Reference: Keyser had previously released a statement through her attorney saying that she did not remember the party in question, and that she does not remember ever meeting Kavanaugh.
Translation: Earlier, Keyser released a statement through her attorney saying she does not recall the party and does not know if she ever met Kavanaugh.

Source: Ketvirtadienį liudydamas prieš Teismų komitetą, Kavanaugh‘as dažnai minėjo Keyser pareiškimą kaip savo nekaltumo įrodymą, tačiau neužsiminė apie Keyser teiginį, kad ji tikinti Ford žodžiais.
Reference: In his testimony before the Judiciary Committee Thursday, Kavanaugh often brought up Keyser's statement as proof of his innocence, although he omitted that Keyser said that she believed Ford.
Translation: On Thursday, testifying before the Judiciary Committee, Kavanaugh frequently cited Keyser's statement as evidence of his innocence, but did not mention Keyser's claim that she believed Ford's words.

Source: Prezidentas Trumpas penktadienį nurodė FTB atlikti tyrimą per savaitę, kai respublikonų senatorius Jeffas Flake’as ir kiti nuosaikių pažiūrų senatoriai paprašė duoti laiko tyrimui ir savaitei atidėti viso Senato balsavimą dėl Kavanaugh‘o.
Reference: President Trump instructed the FBI to conduct an investigation within one week on Friday, after Republican Sen. Jeff Flake and other moderate senators called for a weeklong delay on a full Senate vote on Kavanaugh's confirmation to give time for an investigation.
Translation: President Trump on Friday directed the FBI to conduct an investigation over the week, when Republican Senator Jeff Flake and other moderate senators asked for time for the investigation and to delay the full Senate vote on Kavanaugh for a week.

Source: Šeštadienį Keyser per savo advokatą komitetui atsiuntė laišką, kuriame teigė, kad nori „kaip galėdama prisidėti prie papildomo FTB tyrimo“ dėl Kavanaugh‘o.
Reference: On Saturday, Keyser said through her lawyer in a letter to the committee that she was willing to "cooperate fully with the FBI's supplemental investigation" into Kavanaugh.
Translation: On Saturday, Keyser sent a letter through her attorney to the committee stating that she wants "to cooperate fully with any additional review of FTB" regarding Kavanaugh.

Source: „Tačiau, kaip mano klientė jau paaiškino, ji nepažįsta teisėjo Kavanaugh‘o ir neprisimena vakarėlio ar susibūrimo, kuriame jis būtų buvęs su arba be dr. Ford“, – teigiama Keyser advokato Howardo Walsho laiške.
Reference: "However, as my client has already made clear, she does not know Judge Kavanaugh and has no recollection of ever being at a party or gathering where he was present, with, or without, Dr. Ford," the letter from Howard Walsh, Keyser's attorney, said.
Translation: "However, as my client has already stated, she does not know Judge Kavanaugh and has no recollection of ever attending a gathering or party with him, with or without Dr. Ford," the letter from Keyser's attorney, Howard Walsh, states.

Source: Laiške toliau paaiškinama, kad Keyser „neatmeta dr. Ford pasakojimo ir jau sakė spaudai, kad tiki dr. Ford liudijimu.“
Reference: It continued that Keyser "does not refute Dr. Ford's account, and she has already told the press that she believes Dr. Ford's account."
Translation: In the letter, it is further explained that Keyser "does not dismiss Dr. Ford's account and has already told the press that he believes Dr. Ford's testimony."

Source: „Tačiau paprasčiausia ir nepakeičiama tiesa yra ta, kad ji negali jo patvirtinti, nes neprisimena minėto nutikimo“, – tęsiama laiške.
Reference: "However, the simple and unchangeable truth is that she is unable to corroborate it because she has no recollection of the incident in question," the letter continued.
Translation: However, the simplest and irrefutable truth is that she cannot confirm it, because she does not remember the mentioned incident.

Source: Kavanaugh’o draugas Markas Judge’as, tariamai buvęs šalia per užpuolimą, teigė taip pat prisidėsiąs prie FTB tyrimo.
Reference: Mark Judge, a friend of Kavanaugh's who was allegedly present during the assault, has also said that he will cooperate with the FBI investigation.
Translation: Kavanaugh's friend Mark Judge, who was allegedly present during the assault, also claimed he would cooperate with the FBI investigation.

Source: Neteisėtai nuteisti Čikagos gyventojai pasakoja apie gyvenimą su korumpuotu policininku ir jo gauja
Reference: Wrongfully convicted Chicago residents recall life under corrupt cop and his "gang"
Translation: Illegally convicted Chicago residents tell about life with a corrupt police officer and his crew

Source: Vyriausiasis Ilinojaus prokuroras bando pakeisti Čikagos policijos istoriją po tamsaus laikotarpio.
Reference: The top prosecutor in Illinois is trying to turn the page from a dark period in Chicago police history.
Translation: The top Illinois prosecutor is trying to change the history of the Chicago police after a dark period.

Source: Manoma, kad nesąžiningas policininkas išnaudojo nekaltus socialinių būstų gyventojus ir nepagrįstai suėmė daugybę žmonių.
Reference: It's believed that one bad cop preyed on innocent residents of a housing project, rounding up dozens of people on bogus charges.
Translation: It is believed that the corrupt policeman exploited innocent social housing residents and unjustifiably arrested many people.

Source: Iki šiol išteisinti 42 neteisėtai nuteisti žmonės.
Reference: So far, 42 wrongly convicted people have been exonerated.
Translation: So far, 42 people who were wrongly convicted have been exonerated.

Source: Ida B. Wells projekto socialinių būstų projekto vietoje šiuo metu likusi tik tuščia aikštelė, o anksčiau jų gyventojus daugiau nei dešimtmetį kone nieko nesibaimindami išnaudojo korumpuoti Čikagos policininkai.
Reference: An empty lot is now all that's left of the Ida B. Wells housing project where a group of corrupt Chicago cops preyed almost risk-free on residents for most of a decade.
Translation: The site of the Ida B. Wells housing project is now just an empty lot, but for more than a decade its residents were exploited with impunity by corrupt Chicago police officers.

Source: Jiems vadovavo seržantas Ronaldas Wattsas.
Reference: Sergeant Ronald Watts was their ringleader.
Translation: They were led by Sergeant Ronald Watts.

Source: Gyventojai apkaltino jį ir jo taktinį būrį turto prievartavimu, policijos ataskaitų bei įkalčių klastojimu ir prievarta.
Reference: Residents have accused him and his tactical squad of extortion, filing false police reports, planting evidence and assault.
Translation: The residents accused him and his tactical team of property seizure, falsification of police reports and evidence, and coercion.

Source: Willie’is Martinas ir Cleonas Gloveris yra du iš tų nuteistųjų, kuriuos iki šiol išteisino Kuko apygardos generalinė prokurorė Kim Foxx.
Reference: Willie Martin and Cleon Glover are two of those exonerated so far by Cook County state attorney Kim Foxx.
Translation: Willie Martin and Cleon Glover are two of those convicted individuals who have been exonerated by Cook County State's Attorney Kim Foxx so far.

Source: „Jei nedirbdavai kartu su juo, tau baigdavosi blogai.
Reference: "If you didn't cooperate with him, you was going down.
Translation: "If you didn't work together with him, it would end badly for you."

Source: Tu buvai jo priešas.
Reference: You was against him.
Translation: You were his enemy.

Source: Tu trukdei jam veikti ir pelnytis“, – apie Wattsą pasakojo Cleonas Gloveris.
Reference: You was against his operation and his way of getting money," Cleon Glover said of Watts.
Translation: "You hindered him from working and earning," - said Cleon Glover about Watts.

Source: „Labai bijojau.
Reference: "I was terrified.
Translation: "I was very afraid."
